name: Survive the Night (itch) (pollock)
description:
You are camping in the Yorkshire woods with some friends when one night, you wake up to find that they're all missing. As you try to find out what happened to them, you discover that you're not alone in the woods. Will you be able to survive the night and reach daylight to get help, or will you perish in the wilderness?

Survive the Night is an interactive fiction game that lets you explore the mysterious and dangerous woods of England. With multiple story branches and endings, your choices will determine your fate. Will you follow the river to safety, or will you confront the hunters who have captured your friends? Will you enter the spooky cave or stay with the friendly villagers? The possibilities are endless, but the dangers are real.

Immerse yourself in this thrilling game and experience the thrill of surviving in the wilderness. Are you ready to face the challenges of the Yorkshire woods and find your way back to safety? Play Lost in the Yorkshire Woods now and find out!
